capability.name: Advanced Voice Services Operations
capability.definition: This service domain operates the telephone channel infrastructure, including the IVR and any other automated devices as appropriate. This includes handling default routing rules and intra-day/session adjustments to deal with peak load or other operational variations
capability.role: This service domain handles the operation of the PBX/telephony infrastructure which can include embedded IVR capabilities. The PBX system will have close integration with the call center and E-Branch capabilities depending on the degree of computer telephony integration (CTI) and cross channel support
capability.example: The numeric menu is adjusted to increase self-serve activity during a period of peak loading (this could be implemented in the IVR in a more sophisticated set-up)

key_features.name: Handle in-bound customer voice contacts
key_features.description: Enables handle in-bound customer voice contacts to support this service domain operates the telephone channel infrastructure, including the ivr and any other automated devices as appropriate

key_features.name: Provide out bound voice connections voice
key_features.description: Enables provide out bound voice connections voice to support this service domain operates the telephone channel infrastructure, including the ivr and any other automated devices as appropriate

key_features.name: Handle service issue reporting and resolution
key_features.description: Enables handle service issue reporting and resolution to support this service domain operates the telephone channel infrastructure, including the ivr and any other automated devices as appropriate
